Title: Midnight Oud
Body (HTML):
A masterful composition that unveils the mystique of aged oud wood, harvested from century-old Aquilaria trees. Midnight Oud opens with a whisper of saffron and Bulgarian rose, before descending into the depths of Cambodian oud, enriched by amber and a hint of smoky incense. This is not merely a fragrance—it's an invitation into a world of quiet luxury.

Top Notes: Saffron, Bulgarian Rose, Pink Pepper
Heart Notes: Cambodian Oud, Incense, Orris
Base Notes: Amber, Sandalwood, Musk

Title: Velvet Noir
Body (HTML):
Inspired by the soft darkness of a velvet curtain in a Parisian theatre, Velvet Noir wraps you in the supple warmth of Italian leather, softened by iris butter and tonka bean. A composition of refined decadence that whispers rather than shouts—for those who understand that true luxury needs no announcement.

Top Notes: Bergamot, Black Pepper, Cardamom
Heart Notes: Iris Butter, Violet Leaf, Leather
Base Notes: Tonka Bean, Benzoin, Cashmere Musk

Title: Garden of Hesperides
Body (HTML):
A sun-drenched journey through the mythical garden where golden apples grew. This luminous composition captures the effervescence of Italian bergamot and Sicilian lemon, grounded by the earthy elegance of vetiver and white cedar. Fresh yet sophisticated—a fragrance that transforms the everyday into the extraordinary.

Top Notes: Sicilian Lemon, Italian Bergamot, Grapefruit
Heart Notes: Neroli, Orange Blossom, Petitgrain
Base Notes: Vetiver, White Cedar, Ambrette Seed

Title: Rose Immortelle
Body (HTML):
An ode to the eternal rose, reimagined through the lens of modern perfumery. We've woven together the velvety petals of Turkish rose absolute with the honeyed warmth of immortelle flowers, creating a scent that defies time. Neither vintage nor contemporary—Rose Immortelle exists in its own beautiful dimension.

Top Notes: Pink Pepper, Pear, Raspberry
Heart Notes: Turkish Rose Absolute, Immortelle, Peony
Base Notes: Patchouli, Vanilla, White Musk

Title: Tobacco & Honey
Body (HTML):
A study in contrasts—the rugged warmth of Virginia tobacco leaf meets the golden sweetness of wild honey. Enriched with rum absolute and a whisper of dried fruits, this composition evokes evenings by the fire in a leather-bound library. Sophisticated, addictive, unforgettable.

Top Notes: Honey, Dried Fruits, Cinnamon
Heart Notes: Virginia Tobacco, Rum Absolute, Jasmine
Base Notes: Vanilla, Benzoin, Guaiac Wood

Title: White Suede
Body (HTML):
The essence of understated elegance. White Suede captures the texture of the finest calfskin suede, softened by clouds of white musk and the subtle sweetness of heliotrope. A fragrance of quiet confidence that leaves an impression long after you've left the room.

Top Notes: Aldehydes, Lily of the Valley, Violet
Heart Notes: White Suede, Heliotrope, Rose
Base Notes: White Musk, Cashmeran, Sandalwood

Title: Bois Sauvage
Body (HTML):
Deep in an ancient forest where sunlight filters through the canopy, Bois Sauvage was born. This composition layers precious woods—sandalwood from Mysore, Atlas cedar, and wild oud—with the green freshness of crushed ferns and juniper berries. Untamed, noble, and profoundly masculine.

Top Notes: Juniper Berries, Pine Needles, Bergamot
Heart Notes: Fern, Geranium, Labdanum
Base Notes: Mysore Sandalwood, Atlas Cedar, Wild Oud

Title: Ambre Céleste
Body (HTML):
Amber in its most celestial form. We've elevated this ancient ingredient with precious resins from Oman and Madagascar vanilla, then illuminated it with saffron and a breath of incense smoke. Ambre Céleste doesn't just sit on the skin—it becomes one with it, creating a scent uniquely yours.

Top Notes: Saffron, Cardamom, Cinnamon
Heart Notes: Amber, Frankincense, Myrrh
Base Notes: Madagascar Vanilla, Labdanum, Benzoin

Title: Jasmine Dreams
Body (HTML):
Captured at midnight when jasmine reveals its most intoxicating facets, this fragrance is pure seduction. Indian jasmine sambac intertwines with tuberose and ylang-ylang, supported by a bed of creamy sandalwood and skin musks. For the woman who knows the power of a beautiful scent.

Top Notes: Neroli, Green Notes, Pear
Heart Notes: Indian Jasmine Sambac, Tuberose, Ylang-Ylang
Base Notes: Sandalwood, Skin Musk, Cedarwood

Title: Nomad's Path
Body (HTML):
A fragrance that tells the story of ancient trade routes—from the spice markets of Marrakech to the silk roads of the East. Nomad's Path weaves together rare spices, precious resins, and animalic musks into a tapestry of scent that is both primitive and refined. For the adventurer whose journey never ends.

Top Notes: Black Pepper, Cumin, Ginger
Heart Notes: Saffron, Rose, Cinnamon Bark
Base Notes: Oud, Civet, Sandalwood, Leather
Tags: spicy, exotic, evening, unisex, exclusive, limited
